summary:
A patient reported to the medical center that a their controlled substance prescription package had their patient medication label on the outside of the package which was visible under the shipping label. Patient name and type of medication was compromised. No SSN was compromised. Murfreesboro Consolidated Mail
Outpatient Pharmacy (CMOP) investigation concludes that this was a CMOP packing error. The CMOP employee(s) will be counseled and retrained in proper packing procedures.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
